title: Every 2 months or so my client will get corrupted data!
body:
Hey there, Onwodori here.

As my question states, about every 2 months or so my data will corrupt and I'll get bug-splatted out of the game before I even load in, usually causing a remake to happen and my account to get a leave placed on it. These sometimes even get me Queue penalties!

Thoughts?

-Onwodori

UPDATE - I have received a 5 game penalty because of this.

https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-0/p526x296/14906883_1787027994918673_6753445440334090359_n.jpg?oh=ac9f93eed7afe65e206ea31ffe435fcc&oe=58CF51BB

Could I please have this reverted? This really, really isn't my fault and I hate that I get punished for it so frequently.

replies.body: [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties are not something that can be manually removed.  The best way to recover from that is by playing without leaving matches.  Bugsplats could be cause by bad drivers or game files, so it's really important to get that fixed up asap.  I recommend going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to work towards a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hrm okay =/ This has been a long running issue, unfortunately.
